# Pain (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Rallaster]], [[Scahrossar]] |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** Character converts damage that he deals in one blow per day into healing for himself, up to 1 point of damage per level.

**Pain Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Angry Ache (Spell)|Angry Ache]]****:** Subject takes –2 penalty on attack rolls.

**2** **[[Sadism (Spell)|Sadism]]****:** For every 10 hp damage caster deals, he gains +1 on attacks, saves, and checks.

**3 [[Wrack (Spell)|Wrack]]:** Blinds subject and renders it [[Helpless|helpless]] for 1 round/level, then –2 on attacks, saves, and checks for 3d10 minutes.

**4** **[[Liquid Pain (Spell)|Liquid Pain]]****:** Extracts one dose of liquid pain from tortured victim.

**5** **[[Thousand Needles (Spell)|Thousand Needles]]****:** Piercing needles deal 2d6 damage, and target takes –4 penalty on attacks, saves, and checks.

**6** **[[Pox (Spell)|Pox]]****:** One creature/level takes 1d4 Con drain.

**7** **[[Wave of Pain (Spell)|Wave of Pain]]****:** Stuns all within cone for 1 round/2 levels.

**8** **[[Symbol of Pain (Spell)|Symbol of Pain]]****:** Triggered rune causes pain.

**9** **[[Eternity of Torture (Spell)|Eternity of Torture]]****:** Target is rendered helpless, ageless, and has all ability scores except for Con drop to 0.

**Source:** Book of Vile Darkness (WotC), pg. 81
